channel.title: Spell book with staff
channel.description:
Ok i want to know if there is a code where like rs when u equip a staff you click the book and the spells come up (air strike. water strike, earth stike ect.) and whn i click the spell i want it wil close and go back to the staff thing where i can choose battle things like block and when i click an enemy it auto fires that spell
Plz help[br][size=1]Posted on: June 08, 2007, 03:17:54 PM[/size][hr]any 1?

item.title: Spell book with staff
item.dc:creator: @MMcGrady2 MMcGrady2
item.description:
@MMcGrady2 wrote:

[quote=“Goodoo dolls, post:1, topic:107931”]Ok i want to know if there is a code where like rs when u equip a staff you click the book and the spells come up (air strike. water strike, earth stike ect.) and whn i click the spell i want it wil close and go back to the staff thing where i can choose battle things like block and when i click an enemy it auto fires that spell

Plz help[br][size=1]Posted on: June 08, 2007, 03:17:54 PM[/size][hr]any 1?[/quote]Thats called auto-casting, there’s a tutorial out there for it.

[quote=“owner Ethan, post:2, topic:107931”]that can only happen on a client O_o i think u talking bout a server or client[/quote]You must be really stupid. That’s got NOTHING to do with clients. This is all server side.
